languages.text: {n}Гемункулы начинают говорить одновременно, перебивая друг друга.{/n} "Ты!.."{n} — злобно сквозь зубы шипит один из них.{/n} "Как ты посмел{mf||а}..." {n}— вторит ему другой.{/n} "...явиться сюда живьем!" {n}— отвечает третий.{/n} "Впрочем, так даже лучше..." {n}—{/n} "...теперь я омою {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusKilled}позор своей смерти{/d} твоей кровью..." {n}—{/n} "...а затем преображу тебя и твой сброд во что-то полезное!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Гемункулы начинают говорить одновременно, перебивая друг друга.{/n} "Ты!.."{n} — злобно сквозь зубы шипит один из них.{/n} "Как ты посмел{mf||а}..." {n}— вторит ему другой.{/n} "...явиться сюда живьем!" {n}— отвечает третий.{/n} "Впрочем, так даже лучше..." {n}—{/n} "...теперь я омою позор своей смерти твоей кровью..." {n}—{/n} "...а затем преображу тебя и твой сброд во что-то полезное!"
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}The Haemonculi start talking over one another.{/n} "You!" {n}one of them hisses through his teeth.{/n} "How dare you..." {n}echoes another.{/n} "...show up here alive!" {n}a third one finishes.{/n} "This is even better, though..." {n}—{/n} "...now I'll cleanse the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusKilled}shame of my death{/d} with your blood..." {n}—{/n} "...and then transform you, and the scum you've brought along, into something useful!"
languages.original_text: {n}Гемункулы начинают говорить одновременно, перебивая друг друга.{/n} "Ты!.."{n} — злобно сквозь зубы шипит один из них.{/n} "Как ты посмел{mf||а}..." {n}— вторит ему другой.{/n} "...явиться сюда живьем!" {n}— отвечает третий.{/n} "Впрочем, так даже лучше..." {n}—{/n} "...теперь я омою {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusKilled}позор своей смерти{/d} твоей кровью..." {n}—{/n} "...а затем преображу тебя и твой сброд во что-то полезное!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Haemonculi start talking over one another.{/n} "You!" {n}one of them hisses through his teeth.{/n} "How dare you..." {n}echoes another.{/n} "...show up here alive!" {n}a third one finishes.{/n} "This is even better, though" {n}—{/n} "now I'll cleanse the shame of my death with your blood" {n}—{/n} "and then transform you, and the scum you've brought along, into something useful!"
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

traits.locale_text: {n}The Haemonculi start talking over one another.{/n} "You!" {n}one of them hisses through his teeth.{/n} "How dare you..." {n}echoes another.{/n} "...show up here alive!" {n}a third one finishes.{/n} "This is even better, though..." {n}—{/n} "...now I'll cleanse the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusKilled}shame of my death{/d} with your blood..." {n}—{/n} "...and then transform you, and the scum you've brought along, into something useful!"
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}眼前的血伶人一个接着一个开了口。{/n}“是你！”{n}其中一个齿间发着嘶嘶声。{/n}“你竟敢……”{n}另一个血伶人的回声传了过来。{/n}“……活着出现在这个地方！”{n}第三个人开了口。{/n}“不过，这样更好……”{n}——{/n}“我要用你的鲜血洗刷我{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusKilled}死亡的耻辱{/d}！”{n}——{/n}“之后再把你和你身边的渣滓变成更有用的东西！”
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculi start talking over one another.{/n} "You!" {n}one of them hisses through his teeth.{/n} "How dare you..." {n}echoes another.{/n} "...show up here alive!" {n}a third one finishes.{/n} "This is even better, though..." {n}—{/n} "...now I'll cleanse the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusKilled}shame of my death{/d} with your blood..." {n}—{/n} "...and then transform you, and the scum you've brought along, into something useful!"

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的血伶人一个接着一个开了口。{/n}“是你！”{n}其中一个齿间发着嘶嘶声。{/n}“你竟敢……”{n}另一个血伶人的回声传了过来。{/n}“……活着出现在这个地方！”{n}第三个人开了口。{/n}“不过，这样更好……”{n}——{/n}“我要用你的鲜血洗刷我死亡的耻辱！”{n}——{/n}“之后再把你和你身边的渣滓变成更有用的东西！”
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}Die Haemonculi fangen an, durcheinanderzureden.{/n} "Ihr!"{n}, zischt einer von ihnen durch seine Zähne.{/n} "Wie könnt Ihr es wagen ..."{n}, ertönt es von einem anderen.{/n} "... Euch lebendig hier zu zeigen!"{n}, vollendet ein dritter.{/n} "Aber das ist noch besser." {n}-{/n} "Nun spüle ich die {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusKilled}Schmach meines Todes{/d} mit Eurem Blut fort." {n}-{/n} "Und dann verwandle ich Euch und den Abschaum, den Ihr mitgebracht habt, in etwas Nützliches!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculi start talking over one another.{/n} "You!" {n}one of them hisses through his teeth.{/n} "How dare you..." {n}echoes another.{/n} "...show up here alive!" {n}a third one finishes.{/n} "This is even better, though..." {n}—{/n} "...now I'll cleanse the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusKilled}shame of my death{/d} with your blood..." {n}—{/n} "...and then transform you, and the scum you've brought along, into something useful!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Haemonculi fangen an, durcheinanderzureden.{/n} "Ihr!"{n}, zischt einer von ihnen durch seine Zähne.{/n} "Wie könnt Ihr es wagen ..."{n}, ertönt es von einem anderen.{/n} "... Euch lebendig hier zu zeigen!"{n}, vollendet ein dritter.{/n} "Aber das ist noch besser." {n}-{/n} "Nun spüle ich die Schmach meines Todes mit Eurem Blut fort." {n}-{/n} "Und dann verwandle ich Euch und den Abschaum, den Ihr mitgebracht habt, in etwas Nützliches!"
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}Los hemónculos empiezan a hablar todos a la vez.{/n} «¡Tú!», {n}bufa uno de ellos.{/n} «¡Cómo te atreves...!», {n}espeta otro.{/n} «¡... a aparecer aquí con vida!», {n}concluye un tercero.{/n} «Pero así es mucho mejor» {n}—{/n} «porque ahora puedo lavar con tu sangre la {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusKilled}deshonra de mi muerte{/d}» {n}—{/n} «¡y después te transformaré, a ti y a la escoria que te acompaña, en algo medianamente útil!».
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculi start talking over one another.{/n} "You!" {n}one of them hisses through his teeth.{/n} "How dare you..." {n}echoes another.{/n} "...show up here alive!" {n}a third one finishes.{/n} "This is even better, though..." {n}—{/n} "...now I'll cleanse the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusKilled}shame of my death{/d} with your blood..." {n}—{/n} "...and then transform you, and the scum you've brought along, into something useful!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Los hemónculos empiezan a hablar todos a la vez.{/n} «¡Tú!», {n}bufa uno de ellos.{/n} «¡Cómo te atreves...!», {n}espeta otro.{/n} «¡... a aparecer aquí con vida!», {n}concluye un tercero.{/n} «Pero así es mucho mejor» {n}—{/n} «porque ahora puedo lavar con tu sangre la deshonra de mi muerte» {n}—{/n} «¡y después te transformaré, a ti y a la escoria que te acompaña, en algo medianamente útil!».
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}Les hémoncules se mettent tous à parler en même temps.{/n} « Vous ! » {n}crache l'un d'entre eux, la mâchoire serrée.{/n} « Comment osez-vous... » {n}lance un autre.{/n} « ... vous montrer ici {mf|vivant|vivante} ? » {n}finit un troisième.{/n} « Tout compte fait, je préfère ça... » {n}—{/n} « ... car je vais pouvoir laver {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusKilled}l'affront de ma mort{/d} dans votre sang... »{n}—{/n} « ... avant de vous transformer, vous et les vermines qui vous accompagnent, en quelque chose d'utile ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculi start talking over one another.{/n} "You!" {n}one of them hisses through his teeth.{/n} "How dare you..." {n}echoes another.{/n} "...show up here alive!" {n}a third one finishes.{/n} "This is even better, though..." {n}—{/n} "...now I'll cleanse the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusKilled}shame of my death{/d} with your blood..." {n}—{/n} "...and then transform you, and the scum you've brought along, into something useful!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les hémoncules se mettent tous à parler en même temps.{/n} « Vous ! » {n}crache l'un d'entre eux, la mâchoire serrée.{/n} « Comment osez-vous... » {n}lance un autre.{/n} « ... vous montrer ici {mf|vivant|vivante} ? » {n}finit un troisième.{/n} « Tout compte fait, je préfère ça... » {n}—{/n} « ... car je vais pouvoir laver l'affront de ma mort dans votre sang... » {n}—{/n} « ... avant de vous transformer, vous et les vermines qui vous accompagnent, en quelque chose qui pourra me servir ! »
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}ハモンキュラスが互いに話し始めた。{/n}「貴様！」{n}一人が歯ぎしりしながら叫ぶ。{/n}「よくも…」{n}もう一人が叫ぶ。{/n}「…生きてここに現れた！」{n}3人目が言い終わる。{/n}「しかし、これはこれで良い」{n}―{/n}「今、私はお前の血で私の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusKilled}死の恥{/d}を清める」{n}―{/n}「そしてお前と、お前が連れてきたクズどもを変えてやる！何か役に立つものに！」
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculi start talking over one another.{/n} "You!" {n}one of them hisses through his teeth.{/n} "How dare you..." {n}echoes another.{/n} "...show up here alive!" {n}a third one finishes.{/n} "This is even better, though..." {n}—{/n} "...now I'll cleanse the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusKilled}shame of my death{/d} with your blood..." {n}—{/n} "...and then transform you, and the scum you've brought along, into something useful!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハモンキュラスが互いに話し始めた。{/n}「貴様！」{n}一人が歯ぎしりしながら叫ぶ。{/n}「よくも…」{n}もう一人が叫ぶ。{/n}「…生きてここに現れた！」{n}3人目が言い終わる。{/n}「しかし、これはこれで良い」{n}―{/n}「今、私はお前の血で私の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusKilled}死の恥{/d}を清める」{n}―{/n}「そしてお前と、お前が連れてきたクズどもを変えてやる！何か役に立つものに！」
traits.speaker: Haemonculus

languages.text: {n}Haimonkuluslar, birbirlerinin peşi sıra konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Sen!" {n}Bir tanesi tıslıyor.{/n} "Hangi cüretle..." {n}Bir diğeri bağırıyor.{/n} "...Buraya canlı gelirsin?" {n}Üçüncüsü tamamlıyor.{/n} "Gerçi böylesi daha iyi..." {n}—{/n} "...Şimdi {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusKilled}ölümün utancından{/d} senin kanınla arınacağım..." {n}—{/n} "...Sonra da senden ve o yanındaki pisliklerden... Çok güzel şeyler yapacağım!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculi start talking over one another.{/n} "You!" {n}one of them hisses through his teeth.{/n} "How dare you..." {n}echoes another.{/n} "...show up here alive!" {n}a third one finishes.{/n} "This is even better, though..." {n}—{/n} "...now I'll cleanse the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusKilled}shame of my death{/d} with your blood..." {n}—{/n} "...and then transform you, and the scum you've brought along, into something useful!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Haimonkuluslar birbirlerinin peşi sıra konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Sen!" {n}, diye tıslıyor bir tanesi.{/n} "Hangi cüretle..." {n},diye bağırıyor diğeri.{/n} "...Buraya canlı gelirsin?" {n} , diye tamamlıyor üçüncüsü.{/n} "Gerçi böylesi daha iyi..." {n}—{/n} "...Şimdi {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_HaemonkulusKilled}ölümün utancından{/d} senin kanınla arınacağım..." {n}—{/n} "...Sonra da senden ve o yanındaki pisliklerden... Çok güzel şeyler yapacağım!"
traits.speaker: Haemonculus
